name: Giuseppe Rebuzzini
subtitle: CEO at MET Energia Italia Spa
about: I'm a professional operating in the European Energy Sector with wide expertise in the fields of Gas & Power Assets optimisation, Gas Trading, LNG, Renewable Development and M&A.In my current role as Senior Partner and MD of White Tree Energy and Environment I am involved both as an Advisor and as Originator and Equity Investor in these areas. In my career I've also managed the decommissioning of power assets in EU and the restructuring and wind-down of complex organizations.I have expertise in participating to and managing Board Meetings and I'm accustomed to working into highly complex organizations and delivering high-standard products both internally and to customers.Finally, I have recognized skills in evaluating assets and companies and a significant expertise of the European financial markets, both Equity and Commodity: as part of my current activities I work with  Fidentiis Equities, an established financial boutique, to provide finacial advisory on the main energy companies whose stocks are listed in Milan Stock Exchange.
experiences:
White Tree Energy & Environment is a small company whose objective is to provide advisory to companies operating in the gas & power business (including renewables) and to originate double digit return opportunities in the energy and environment arena.

White Tree currently operates as Advisor to a Gas & Power trader in Europe and to a company operating in the Energy Asset Decommissioning and Environmental Business.

White Tree is originating and managing opportunities to relocate valuable Power Generation Assets from Europe to other geographies.
Managing a team of 8 involved in Gas Marketing and Trading Italy, management of Power Generation (MW400), Business Development on LNG and M&A in Power Gen, LNG and Renewables.
